## ResourceManagerBuilder.getCandidatesForContext() method

Gets a read-only array of all [resource candidates](./ts-res.resources.resourcecandidate.md) that can match the supplied context.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getCandidatesForContext(context: Context.IValidatedContextDecl, options?: Context.IContextMatchOptions): ReadonlyArray<ResourceCandidate>;
```

</td><td>

**Returns:**

ReadonlyArray&lt;[ResourceCandidate](./ts-res.resourcecandidate.md)<!-- -->&gt;

A read-only array of [candidates](./ts-res.resources.resourcecandidate.md) that can match the context.
